alert.note: Alert for Crockett; Dyer; Gibson; Haywood; Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 11:48PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Crockett, central Dyer, west central Gibson, northeastern Lauderdale and northwestern Haywood Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1148 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bradleytown, or near Dyersburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dyersburg, Ripley, Newbern, Halls, Forked Deer, Chestnut Bluff, Bradleytown, Unionville, Eaton, Maury City, Friendship, Gates, Yorkville, Edith, Fowlkes, Lapata, Bonicord, Central, Jenkinsville and Rohoboth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
